description: Update documentation to reflect the new reusable AI loop and ContextManager.
instructions: Locate relevant sections where the AI interaction flow or context handling is discussed.

Explain how these components work together and how they improve the AI interaction process.
Provide examples or guidance on how other agent handlers or parts of the system can utilize the new AI loop and ContextManager.
Find sections related to the internal workings of the AI Whisperer, particularly regarding AI calls and state management.
Update these sections to incorporate the details of the new AI loop and ContextManager.
Describe the role of these components in managing conversation history, state, and interacting with the AI service.
Ensure the documentation accurately reflects the refactored architecture.
Add comprehensive docstrings to the `AILoop` class and any methods or functions within it, explaining their purpose, parameters, and return values.
Add comprehensive docstrings to the `ContextManager` class and any methods or functions within it, explaining their purpose, parameters, and return values.
Review all updated documentation files for clarity, accuracy, and completeness.

constraints: Documentation updates must be accurate and reflect the current implementation of the AI loop and ContextManager.
